message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. I'd be happy to buy it for $70.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $90
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $90 is still a bit high for me.  How about $85? I'm really interested in this product, and I think this price would be fair for both of us.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can offer it to you for $92.50
